Dear Hagop,

I hope all is well.

Would you be able to help us with De Beers request below for the insurance certificate?

Best Regards

From: Christopher Matsumoto <Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com>
Sent: Friday, April 11, 2025 4:00:12 PM
To: Ceriani, Salome <Salome.Ceriani@debeersgroup.com>
Cc: Romy Ammar <Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com>; Stephanie Tieu <stieu@debeers.com>; Chloe Beauchet <cbeauchet@debeers.com>; International Logistics <internationallogistics@debeers.com>; Khaled, Fadi <Fadi.Khaled@debeersgroup.com>
Subject: Re: Items to be included in the Chalhoub insurance - for the event 
 
Dear Salome,

Many thanks for your email, it is a pleasure to be collaborating together.

I have forwarded the request for the supplemental items to our insurance and security teams. Once I have received their confirmation, we will gladly share the requested documents with you. I will make sure to get a speedy response.

chunks.text:
I have forwarded the request for the supplemental items to our insurance and security teams. Once I have received their confirmation, we will gladly share the requested documents with you. I will make sure to get a speedy response.

Our security guard is managed by Sparks Security Services LLC, and we have booked a security guard to be on site for the event from the moment the pieces will be delivered until they return to our boutique.

Should you require any further information, please feel free to contact me.

With best regards,

Chris Matsumoto 
Boutique Manager 
De Beers 
Dubai Mall - Grand Atrium

Dear Chris,

Lovely to e-meet you.

Can I kindly follow up to confirm that you will be able to add the below items to the insurance value of the other HJ sets? Also, would you be able to possibly share the certificate of insurance you have of the event?

It would be great from our side to know as well if you are planning on having any security guards at the event, as well as which company will be providing the service. This is only for our risk management team to be aware of the movement of the pieces.


Thank you,
Salome




________________________________

From: Khaled, Fadi
Sent: Wednesday, April 9, 2025 2:50 PM
To: Christopher Matsumoto
Cc: Romy Ammar; Stephanie Tieu; Chloe Beauchet; Ceriani, Salome; International Logistics
Subject: Items to be included in the Chalhoub insurance - for the event


[OFFICIAL]


Dear Chris,

 

Further to my conversation with Romy.

 

Could you please confirm if the value of the below items could be added to the insurance value of the other HJ sets going to the event.  

USD 114,500 / AED 420,535.60 – TOTAL

 

Based on your feedback, we will update Ferrari who will be handling the shipment.

 

We are asking for this to avoid having different security personnels at the event (and security plans).

 

If unsure about anything, please do not hesitate to ask.

 

Kind regards,

Fadi Khaled

Date: Thursday, 10 April 2025 at 2:16 PM
To: Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> >, Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >, Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> >, Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Romy Ammar <Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com <mailto:Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com> >
Subject: Fw: Items to be included in the Chalhoub insurance - for the event

Dear All,

 

 

Our partners in London will be sending us two additional High Value pieces for our Grand Opening event.

The pieces quoted in the email below will be in addition to the initial 20 pieces we have already sent you.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> : Can these additional consignment pieces be added to the insurance value?

@Kawttar Nassik <mailto:Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com> : Do we have other formalities to follow?

 

Thank you for your help

 

Best regards,  

 

 

Chris Matsumoto

Boutique Manager

 



Dubai Mall - Grand Atrium

Ground Floor, Unit 271

T: + 971 4 271 9838

debeers.dubaimall@chalhoub.com <mailto:debeers.dubaimall@chalhoub.com>
